___

LendingTree Certification:

The LendingTree Certification Program recognizes Lenders and Loan Officers with outstanding performance on the LendingTree Network, they are committed to providing exceptional customer service and are graduates of LendingTree University.

LendingTree Certification:

  • Certified Lenders have demonstrated their organizational commitment to employee development, at least 50% of their loan professionals have been certified while also providing exemplary service to LendingTree consumers.

Loan Officer Certifications:

  • Gold Leaf is the cornerstone of the loan officer certification program and is designed to recognize loan officers committed to their own professional development while adhering to LendingTree best practices. Gold Leaf recipients know the fundamentals of LendingTree and online lending, they are equipped with the necessary skills to be best-in-class loan professionals.
  • President’s Club is presented to an elite group of loan officers based on success levels in several areas including adherence to LendingTree best practices, commitment to professional development and dedication to customer excellence. Recipients have also met all Gold Leaf criteria.

Smartmortgage.com

Lender Summary 

SmartMortgage.com is a division of Guild Mortgage, Inc., which has been an industry leading mortgage banker and direct lender since 1995. We set out to create SmartMortgage.com as a low cost online lender with all the customer service advantages provided by a traditional brick and mortar mortgage bank. Our licensed loan officers have an average 10+ years of experience as mortgage professionals and are guaranteed to be knowledgeable on every aspect of the process.  In addition to providing low cost mortgage services for our clients, we also provide unparalleled information and options. It is common to hear feedback from new clients that we provided options they did not hear about from other lenders. Some common examples include zero PMI loans with less than 20% equity, lender paid closing costs and renovation financing.

(5 of 5) stars
Recommended

Highly Recommend! Excellent experience.

We purchased a new construction home via a FHA loan. Both of those situations come with their own set of unique restrictions and processes. Put them together and it can become a nightmare to try and get everything in line. Mark stayed on top of it all and delivered on everything he promised. The most impressive part of the whole experience was the ability to get ahold of Mark. Almost every single time I called, Mark answered the phone. Even if it was just to say he was busy at the moment and would call me right back (and he would always call back). Getting a person instead of voicemail when you call is unheard of in today's world.
All documents were ready before we needed them. Response on any changes or questions was incredibly quick. Mark checked in constantly throughout the process to let us know where things were at, what the next steps were, and if there was anything we needed to do. I never once wondered what was going on, Mark always kept me well informed.

Mark and his team are, in my opinion, the best. The entire process was so simple and painless. I wouldn’t hesitate to use Mark again. I simply cannot say enough good things about him.

JayC from Olathe, KS 66062

Reviewed in June 2015

Recommended

Used Mark Carrico for my loan. Highly Recommend!!

A top notch experience. Pre-approval was super fast and painless. I had a few items on my credit report I had to take care of. Mark called me and walked through the items I needed to fix and how to fix them. His knowledge of the home buying process and mortgage industry is phenominal. Very easy to contact with any questions and always has the answers.

The entire process from pre-approval to closing was so easy! If you are looking for a good, reputible, reliable, easy to work with lender. You have to contact Mark. He is quite simply the best. I tell everyone I can about him.

You know you have a good lender when both your real estate agent and the title company comment how easy the lender was to work with.

A Trusted & Valued Strategic Partner

From the beginning of 2014 Mark Anderson and the Cornerstone Mortgage team have assisted three of my buyer clients to secure the loans needed to purchase new homes.

Each of these clients had specific goals and specific needs in purchasing their respective homes. Cornerstone and Mark's team were able to work with each buyer and meet those needs and goals.

Consistent and open communication, good listening and planning, and attention to detail are all factors that set Mark and the Cornerstone team apart form the competition.

I look forward to working with Mark for a long time and know that when I refer my clients to his team and Cornerstone, that they are always in great hands.

Recommended

Mark Anderson - Smart Mortgage

This past September I became a first-time home owner. Going into financing portion of this life milestone I, admittedly, had trepidations about the process. I was particularly apprehensive about the lending process as I had observed many friends go through painful and stressful situations with mortgage brokers who were not fully transparent and only told partial truths. Luckily I found Mark Anderson to guide me through this process. What is for most a anxiety and stress -filled situation became simple and stress-free. Mark clearly presented all the options available in a clear-cut, transparent, logical and informative way. At the end of the process I was confident I had made the best possible choice for my financial situation and goals. I woulf highly recommend Mark and his services.
